prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon with a spooky aura and eerie glowing eyes.
I want a humanoid Pokemon that resembles a spirit with dark colors and unique patterns.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the essence of the night with haunting features.
Make a large, intimidating Pokemon that has a blend of gray and yellow shades.
Imagine a creature that has an otherworldly presence, with arms outstretched as if beckoning.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in dark environments and has a mysterious aura.
Show me a ghostly figure that can float and has a unique, ominous design.
